backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and referee booking requests with access control checks for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to files, components, and tests with high-confidence verification metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Mainnet deployment guide detailing prerequisites, build steps, and custom-domain setup for swiftsportshub.com.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining theme variables, color system, and dark mode settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing metadata and detailed instructions for correct public URL configuration using environment variables.
frontend/LIVE_URLS.md: Document defining production URLs, canister ID placeholders, and post-deployment verification checklist.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing site header, landing page, and footer in a flex layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/QuickReque: Admin view listing referee requests with error handling and copy‑to‑clipboard support for email-ready details.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Reusable logo component rendering the SwiftSport image with configurable size classes.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, contact info, availability hours, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Provides a sticky header with logo, navigation links, admin visibility logic, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/lead/ChatbotLead: Implements an interactive multi‑step chatbot for collecting referee request details and submitting them via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Displays contact methods and a quick‑request form with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Shows the homepage hero content with main messaging, stats, call‑to‑action buttons, and a hero image.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Proces: Outlines the officiating request process using a five‑step visual layout with icons and a call‑to‑action.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Renders a marketing services section listing officiating offerings and supported sports with icons and styled cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting booking requests, quick requests, checking admin status, and fetching all referee requests.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for a sports-themed color palette and component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in query and identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the main landing page with marketing sections, admin view, and chatbot widget.
frontend/src/utils/publicSiteBaseUrl.ts: Provides utilities to resolve and normalize the public site base URL and hostname for consistent external URL generation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters and persist them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending typography, colors, animations, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, and pending requests for deployment and domain setup.
